Description: String of 13 tubular blue beads, made of faience.
Curator's comments: According to attached label, "Bought in Philadephia, labeled "Indian beads dug from an Indian mound, Rocky Mts, W. S. Wood, 1868" the locality is probably false - the beads seem to be ancient Egyptian. S. S. Haldeman, 1879". A good example of the type of forgery common at the time in the US antiquities market.
